author: BenjaminRS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the L1T P2 E2E NNVtx Tracks to Vertex association for use with Puppi. This is the PR to the master branch where the development PR to the correlator branch is https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/132, which has gone through a code review there.

#### PR validation:

The following commands were run:
- scram b
- scram b code-format
- scram b code-checks

Further performance validation was performed in https://github.com/p2l1pfp/cmssw/pull/132
title: [L1T] E2E NNVtx Track to Vertex Association in Puppi (Phase 2)
